snippet: On a podium at the Sochi Paralympics, members of Ukraine’s cross-country skiing relay team covered their medals in a silent protest over the situation between their home country and Russia.
abstract: Members of Ukraine's cross-country skiing relay team cover their medals while on the podium at the Sochi Paralympics in silent protest over the situation between their home country and Russia.
lead_paragraph: On a podium at the Sochi Paralympics, members of Ukraine’s cross-country skiing relay team covered their medals in a silent protest over the situation between their home country and Russia.
